name: Ferrari F40
description: The Ferrari F40 is a high-performance sports car that was produced from 1987 to 1992. It is powered by a 2.9-liter twin-turbocharged V8 engine that produces 478 horsepower. The F40 is considered to be one of the most iconic sports cars of all time. Available quantity: 3

name: McLaren F1
description: The McLaren F1 is a mid-engined sports car that was produced from 1992 to 1998. It is powered by a 6.1-liter V12 engine that produces 627 horsepower. The F1 is considered to be one of the fastest and most technologically advanced cars ever made. Available quantity: 2

name: Bugatti Veyron
description: The Bugatti Veyron is a supercar that is known for its top speed of 267.856 mph. It is powered by a 8.0-liter W16 engine that produces 1,001 horsepower. The Veyron is the fastest production car in the world. Available quantity: 1
